resource.chars:
26 Jermyn St.
July. 1852 -
Gentlemen 
I return herewith 
Mr Huxley’s paper on the 
“Morphology of Mollusca”.
It is a memoir of very 
great interest full of 
original observations &
also of theoretical considerations 
of great general interest.
I believe it will constitute 
an important step in advance 
of our knowledge of the 
section of the animal kingdom 
to which it is devoted.
